urlText: Lift at Summer Hill Station not available between the subway and Grosvenor Street
content:
The lift between the subway and Grosvenor Street is temporarily out of service.
From Monday 22nd January till Thursday 25th January 2024 inclusive, lift upgrades will be taking place at Summer Hill station, closing the lift between Platform 3 and Carlton Crescent. 

Customers departing the station that require lift assistance will need to board the train from Platform 2 and interchange at Newtown Station for a train towards Parramatta and Homebush.

Customers arriving on Platform 3 that require lift assistance, will need to interchange at Ashfield Station to return on Platform 2. 
If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9752 8489.
subtitle: Lift at Summer Hill Station not available between the subway and Grosvenor Street

properties.smsText: Lift at Summer Hill Station not available between the subway and Grosvenor Street

Customers arriving on Platform 3 that require lift assistance, will need to interchange at Ashfield Station to return on Platform 2. 
If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9752 8489.

urlText: Lift at Summer Hill Station not available between the subway and platforms 1/2
content:
The lift between the subway and platforms 1/2 is temporarily out of service.
From Friday 19th January till Sunday 21st January 2024 inclusive, lift upgrades will be taking place at Summer Hill station, closing the lift between the concourse and Platforms 1 and 2.

Customers departing the station that require lift assistance will need to board the train from Platform 3 and interchange at Ashfield Station for a train towards the city. 

Customers arriving on Platforms 1 and 2 that require lift assistance, will need to interchange at Newtown station to return via Platform 3. 
If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9752 8489.
subtitle: Lift at Summer Hill Station not available between the subway and platforms 1/2

properties.smsText: Lift at Summer Hill Station not available between the subway and platforms 1/2

Customers departing the station that require lift assistance will need to board the train from Platform 3 and interchange at Ashfield Station for a train towards the city. 

Customers arriving on Platforms 1 and 2 that require lift assistance, will need to interchange at Newtown station to return via Platform 3. 
If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9752 8489.

urlText: Lift at Summer Hill Station not available between the subway and platform 3
content:
The lift between the subway and platform 3 is temporarily out of service.
From Friday 19th January till Thursday 25th January 2024 inclusive, lift upgrades will be taking place at Summer Hill station, closing the lift between the concourse and Grosvenor Crescent. 

Customers requiring lift assistance will need to use the ramp on Carlton Crescent to enter and exit the station.

If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9752 8489.
